subject: Wells Fargo Bank
body:
Wells Fargo Bank
463 BROADWAY in New York
NY 10013 United State
Greetings from the Wells Fargo bank. I have a vital information which
needs to be attended immediately. Did you authorized anyone to pick up
your inheritance fund from our branch in Broadway New York? One Mr
Andrew Cox came to our office yesterday in-respect of your $4.5
billion dollars which has been credited with us for the past 2 months
now by the Federal Government to be transferred into your account. He
said that you authorized him to pick up the fund.
This fund has been in our custody for the past two months now and we
have been waiting for you to contact us. but we didn't know what is
hindering you from reaching us since. So we decided to write to you to
make sure that you are fine and aware of the inheritance fund of $4.5
billion dollars in our branch office in Broadway NY.
We want you to get back to us with the following details:
Full name
Next of kin
Email address
Phone Number
ID Card
Occupation
This above listed details are needed as fast as possible if you didn't
authorize anyone to pick up your fund from our branch in New York.
We have 3 means which you can use to receive your fund and you are to
choose the suitable option for you. Here are the options:
(1) Bank to Bank wire transfer: It will take only 24 hours for you to
receive your fund into your preferred account. 
The cost of transfer
charge is $50.
(2) Credit Card delivery: It will take 24 hours for you to receive
your credit card with the $4.5 billion dollar inside the credit card.
The maximum amount you can withdraw daily is $10,000.
 The delivery fee
is $50.
(3) Consignment box delivery: Your fund will be sealed in a box
without anyone knowing what is inside it and it will be delivered to
your house in cash. It will take 2 working days to be delivered to
your house. 
This will cost $50.
The above mentioned options are the medium which you can use to
receive your fund safely. Endeavor to get back to us as fast as you
can with your details and suitable option if you didn't authorize
anyone to pick up your fund in our branch. Your urgent attention are
needed to enable us proceed with the transaction as your fund is ready
for delivery.
Payment should be Gift card, steam wallet card or iTunes card.
Thank you and have a lovely day.
Regards,
Mr. Leticia Gross
Manager
Wells Fargo Bank

subject: Re: Wells Fargo Bank
body:
Hello Mr. Leticia Gross,

Thank you for reaching out to me from Wells Fargo Bank. I hope you are doing well. I received your message regarding a fund that has been credited to my account. However, I did not authorize anyone to pick up the fund on my behalf.

I appreciate you taking the time to inform me about this matter. Could you please provide more details about the fund? How did it come about and why was it credited to my account by the Federal Government?

Also, I would like to know more about the options you mentioned for receiving the fund. Could you explain each option in more detail? What are the associated costs and requirements for each option?

Lastly, I noticed that you mentioned payment should be made through gift cards or steam wallet cards. Can you please clarify why these specific payment methods are required?

Thank you again for your assistance, and I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Carole
